title: Halo The Master Chief Collection Download
description:
Get Halo: The Master Chief Collection for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
The series that changed console gaming forever is on PC with six blockbuster games in one epic experience. Season 7 has arrived as the latest FREE update for Halo: The Master Chief Collection Enjoy new content like New Halo 3 Elite Armors: Long requested by the Halo Community, players can now customize their Sangheili warriors with seven new armor sets exclusive to Elites. New Halo 3 Maps: Explore completely new arena environments with Edge and Waterfall, the first new Halo 3 maps to be added to matchmaking in over a decade.
